Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to the percentage of free play allowance credits
Summary: Provides that the gaming commission may, at its discretion, authorize an increase to the free play limitation for individual video lottery facilities upon illustration of benefit to the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the percentage of free play allowance credits
